channel.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
channel.description:
The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing I decided to make a Nobliesh Verison of a Neutral killing since This will help a NK claim this easier. Don't yell at Me saying it's just a noble. Passive 1:Diplomatic Immunity-Since you explain to the person attacking you that you can't attack them cause politics you are Death Immune and Occupy immune/Redirection Immune
Passive 2:Royal Blood:Since you are a loyal voter for the king, he has graced you with a vial of royal blood that you may show to step up for the throne incase he dies. Turns into a psycho king
Day ability 1:Poltics-Make somone vote somone else because you explain politics to them which really confused them. (3 uses) Day ability 2:Illegal double voting:Illegally you double voted for a trial making your votes count twice (3 uses)
Night ability 1:It's not personal kid it's just politics-Kill someone (Unlimited uses)
Night ability 2-Your vote is mine-Pick a player to kill. Then pick another player to vote the same as you. (It would show as a noble making you vote somone) (ever had those times you could never click the button fast enough) (now use this night ability for when you need to fast)(they can't vote anyone up unless you choose to vote someone up) (3 uses)
This class is designed to help NK be a 2 man army.
Don't yell at me it's a noble ripoff. By your point aristocrat is also a ripoff of noble.

item.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: NOBLE1
item.description:
I say that he should have a day Ability similar to mystics telepath. So he could use it to target other players. Not as to claim mystic

Read full topic

item.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Damafaud
item.description:
Isn’t this pretty obvious for an an NK

Your vote counting doubles is a glaring difference.

And making someone follow your vote can get this NK found by process of elimination

Can’t you just name it Politician

Read full topic

item.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Firelitten:

Hey kids that’s not how politics work

TBH I would just call this diplomatic immunity.

Read full topic

item.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
@NuclearBurrito I did it. It’s basically a Buffed noble that can kill.

Read full topic

item.title: The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing)
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
The Multi Voter (Neutral Killing
I decided to make a Nobliesh Verison of a Neutral killing since This will help a NK claim this easier. Don’t yell at
Me saying it’s just a noble.
Passive 1:Diplomatic Immunity-Since you explain to the person attacking you that you can’t attack them cause politics you are Death Immune and Occupy immune/Redirection Immune

Passive 2:Royal Blood:Since you are a loyal voter for the king, he has graced you with a vial of royal blood that you may show to step up for the throne incase he dies. Turns into a psycho king

Day ability 1:Poltics-Make somone vote somone else because you explain politics to them which really confused them. (3 uses)
Day ability 2:Illegal double voting:Illegally you double voted for a trial making your votes count twice (3 uses)

Night ability 1:It’s not personal kid it’s just politics-Kill someone (Unlimited uses)

Night ability 2-Your vote is mine-Pick a player to kill. Then pick another player to vote the same as you. (It would show as a noble making you vote somone) (ever had those times you could never click the button fast enough) (now use this night ability for when you need to fast)(they can’t vote anyone up unless you choose to vote someone up) (3 uses)

This class is designed to help NK be a 2 man army.

Don’t yell at me it’s a noble ripoff. By your point aristocrat is also a ripoff of noble.

Read full topic
